int cvmx_llm_get_default_descriptor ( llm_descriptor_t *  llm_desc_ptr  ) 

Gets the default llm descriptor for the board code is being run on.

Parameters:
llm_desc_ptr Pointer to descriptor structure to be filled in. Contents are only valid after successful completion. Must not be NULL.
Returns:
-1 on error 0 on success
int cvmx_llm_initialize ( void   ) 

Initialize LLM memory controller.

This must be done before the low latency memory can be used. This is simply a wrapper around cvmx_llm_initialize_desc(), and is deprecated.

Returns:
-1 on error 0 on success
int cvmx_llm_initialize_desc ( llm_descriptor_t *  llm_desc_ptr  ) 

Initialize LLM memory controller.

This must be done before the low latency memory can be used.

Parameters:
llm_desc_ptr Pointer to descriptor structure. If NULL is passed, a default setting is used if available.
Returns:
-1 on error Size of llm in bytes on success

parity value
static cvmx_llm_data_t cvmx_llm_read_narrow ( cvmx_llm_address_t  address,
int  set 
) [inline, static]

Read from LLM memory - 36 bit.

Parameters:
address Address in LLM to read. Consecutive reads increment the address by 4. The replication mode is also encoded in this address.
set Which of the two coprocessor 2 register sets to use for the write. May be used to get two outstanding LLM access at once per core. Range: 0-1
Returns:
The lower 36 bits contain the result of the read
static uint64_t cvmx_llm_read_wide ( cvmx_llm_address_t  address,
int  set 
) [inline, static]

Read from LLM memory - 64 bit.

Parameters:
address Address in LLM to read. Consecutive reads increment the address by 8. The replication mode is also encoded in this address.
set Which of the two coprocessor 2 register sets to use for the write. May be used to get two outstanding LLM access at once per core. Range: 0-1
Returns:
The result of the read
static void cvmx_llm_write_narrow ( cvmx_llm_address_t  address,
uint64_t  value,
int  set 
) [inline, static]

Write to LLM memory - 36 bit.

Parameters:
address Address in LLM to write. Consecutive writes increment the address by 4. The replication mode is also encoded in this address.
value Value to write to LLM. Only the low 36 bits will be used.
set Which of the two coprocessor 2 register sets to use for the write. May be used to get two outstanding LLM access at once per core. Range: 0-1
static void cvmx_llm_write_wide ( cvmx_llm_address_t  address,
uint64_t  value,
int  set 
) [inline, static]

Write to LLM memory - 64 bit.

Parameters:
address Address in LLM to write. Consecutive writes increment the address by 8. The replication mode is also encoded in this address.
value Value to write to LLM.
set Which of the two coprocessor 2 register sets to use for the write. May be used to get two outstanding LLM access at once per core. Range: 0-1
